400.title: Bad Request
400.desc: The server could not understand your request due to invalid syntax.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.desc: You must be logged in to access this content or resource.

402.title: Payment Required
402.desc: This content is restricted to supporters only. Click below to support us: PayPal

403.title: Forbidden
403.desc: You do not have permission to access this resource. Contact the administrator if you believe this is an error.

404.title: Not Found
404.desc: The requested page or resource could not be found. Please check the URL and try again.

405.title: Method Not Allowed
405.desc: The request method used is not supported for this resource.

406.title: Not Acceptable
406.desc: The requested resource cannot generate a response acceptable by the client.

407.title: Proxy Authentication Required
407.desc: You must authenticate with the proxy before accessing this resource.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.desc: The server timed out waiting for the request. Please try again.

409.title: Conflict
409.desc: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource.

410.title: Gone
410.desc: The requested resource is no longer available and will not be available again.

411.title: Length Required
411.desc: The server requires the Content-Length header to be defined.

412.title: Precondition Failed
412.desc: One or more conditions in the request header fields evaluated to false.

413.title: Payload Too Large
413.desc: The request entity is too large for the server to process.

414.title: URI Too Long
414.desc: The requested URI is too long for the server to handle.

415.title: Unsupported Media Type
415.desc: The server cannot process the request's media type.

416.title: Range Not Satisfiable
416.desc: The requested range is outside the bounds of the target resource.

417.title: Expectation Failed
417.desc: The server cannot meet the expectations indicated by the request.

418.title: I'm a teapot
418.desc: I'm a teapot and cannot brew coffee. (RFC 2324)

421.title: Misdirected Request
421.desc: The request was directed to a server that is not able to produce a response.

422.title: Unprocessable Entity
422.desc: The request was well-formed but couldn't be processed.

423.title: Locked
423.desc: The resource is currently locked and cannot be accessed.

424.title: Failed Dependency
424.desc: The request failed due to a failure in a previous request.

425.title: Too Early
425.desc: The server is unwilling to risk processing a request that might be replayed.

426.title: Upgrade Required
426.desc: The client must switch to a different protocol to continue.

428.title: Precondition Required
428.desc: The server requires the request to be conditional.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.desc: You have sent too many requests in a given amount of time. Please try again later.

431.title: Request Header Fields Too Large
431.desc: The server is unwilling to process the request because header fields are too large.

451.title: Unavailable For Legal Reasons
451.desc: The requested resource is unavailable due to legal restrictions.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.desc: The server encountered an unexpected error and cannot complete your request.

501.title: Not Implemented
501.desc: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.desc: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.desc: The server is currently unavailable due to overload or maintenance.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.desc: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.

505.title: HTTP Version Not Supported
505.desc: The server does not support the HTTP version used in the request.

506.title: Variant Also Negotiates
506.desc: Transparent content negotiation for the request results in a circular reference.

507.title: Insufficient Storage
507.desc: The server cannot store the representation needed to complete the request.

508.title: Loop Detected
508.desc: The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request.

510.title: Not Extended
510.desc: Further extensions to the request are required for the server to fulfill it.

511.title: Network Authentication Required
511.desc: You need to authenticate to gain network access.

-1.title: An Unexpected Error Occurred
-1.desc: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
